description: In 2005, Damien acquired his first camera, igniting his passion for photography. He started experimenting with compositions and candid shots, marking the beginning of his visual storytelling journey.
Damien pursued a degree in Fine Arts with a focus on photography, refining his technical skills and artistic capabilities.
In 2012, Damien held his first solo exhibition, showcasing his unique perspective on nature and people through his lens.
Damien officially launched his photography business in 2015, offering portrait, event, and commercial photography services.
Damien took a road trip around the USA, capturing breathtaking scenes and cultures from around the world.
